Title: The River Wild
Overview: Gail and Tom Hartman are struggling to stay together and decide to take a white-water rafting holiday adventure in Montana for their son Roarke's 10th birthday, only to meet up with a pair of mysterious men whose desperation grows, turning their vacation into a nightmare.
production_companies: Universal Pictures, David Foster Productions, Turman-Foster Company
Cast: Meryl Streep, David Strathairn, Kevin Bacon
clean_text: river wild gail tom hartman struggle stay decide whitewater raft holiday adventure montana son roarke 10th birthday meet pair mysterious man desperation grows turn vacation nightmare vacation adventure thriller curtis hanson meryl streep david strathairn kevin bacon 1994
